amendment.description: Amendment offers relief to mine operators that have been assessed penalties and pays them in a timely fashion. It also establishes a trust fund within Treasury, composed of mine safety civil penalties and provides that funds from the trust can be used for mine safety inspections and investigations only.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-508 to offer relief to mine operators that have been assessed penalties and pa y them in a timely fashion.
